mapper.select: select recipe_no, rn from (select rownum rn, recipe_no, like_count from (select DISTINCT l.recipe_no, (select count(*) from like_HISTORY where r.recipe_no = like_history.recipe_no) as like_count from recipe r, like_history l where r.recipe_no = l.recipe_no and r.reg_date <= sysdate and r.reg_date >= add_months(sysdate, -3) order by like_count desc)) where rn < 6

select recipe_no recipe_no,r.recipe_title recipeTitle, r.chef_no userNo, c.nickname nickname, r.introduction introduction, r.food_img foodImage from recipe r, chef c where r.chef_no = c.chef_no and recipe_no = #{no}
select recipe_no from(select DISTINCT recipe_no, reg_date from tag_history where tag_no = 14 and rownum <= 20) order by reg_date desc
